title: Chapter 785 - The Greatest Expression Of Contempt
volume_title: A Sword Cleaves A Path Through The Netherworld
body:
Chapter 785 - The Greatest Expression Of Contempt

Before Cui Jingyan’s voice had even finished echoing through the air, the two streaks of light caught up to them.

Whoosh! Whoosh!

The skies shook as the misty light transformed into two figures, one man and one woman. 

The man wore Confucian robes and a broad belt, and he had a willowy beard.

The woman was movingly beautiful but icy and aloof. The aura emanating from her made the entire landscape tremble, and everything else seemed dimmer by comparison.

These were none other than the early-stage Profound Illumination Empress, Third Libationer Yuan Linning, and peak Spiritual Revolution Realm Fifth Libationer Lu Changqing.

As soon as the two of them arrived, Yuan Linning’s oppressive Imperial aura spread out, enveloping the surrounding thirty thousand feet.

It was like an invisible web. Those within range felt trapped, as if they could neither run nor hide!

Su Yi and the old blind man stopped in their tracks.

The old blind man stiffened, but he was relatively calm.

This was because when they first left Naihe Divine Mountain, he’d already predicted that Yuan Linning would come after them. Furthermore, Su Yi proceeded at a leisurely pace; he was obviously giving her time to catch up…

“Third...
original_title: Chapter 785 - The Greatest Expression of Contempt
